title: Socioeconomic differences in discrepancies between expected and experienced discomfort from colonoscopy and colon capsule endoscopy
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Ulrik Deding, Henrik Bøggild, Lasse Kaalby, Jacob Hjelmborg, Morten Kobaek-Larsen, Marianne Kirstine Thygesen, Benedicte Schelde-Olesen, Thomas Bjørsum-Meyer, Gunnar Baatrup, CareForColon2015 study group
